summary: human bocavirus 1 messenger ribonucleic acid was found in peripheral blood mononuclear cells. despite low-load viremia, human bocavirus 1 messenger ribonucleic acid was found in peripheral blood mononuclear cells. human bocavirus 1 genomic DNA in blood plasma and human bocavirus 1 messenger ribonucleic acid in peripheral blood mononuclear cells are markers of acute human bocavirus 1 infection that may cause life-threatening acute bronchiolitis.
